alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Lucas; Madison; Marion; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 1:16PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lucas, eastern Madison, southwestern Marion, northeastern Clarke and Warren Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 115 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near West Des Moines to near Avenue Of The Saints Event Center to 13 miles east of Creston. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail and additional rainfall up to one inch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Ponding of ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Avenue Of The Saints Event Center around 120 PM CDT. Norwalk around 125 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Indianola, Lakeside Casino and Osceola. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 31 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
